subject: Baseball
Discrimination
Race and Ethnicity
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: A decade-old racial discrimination case against Jim Crane, who put in the winning bid to take over the Houston Astros, could create a potential problem for Bud Selig.
snippet: A decade-old racial discrimination case against Jim Crane, who put in the winning bid to take over the Houston Astros, could create a potential problem for Bud Selig.
